info.title: Azure IoT Central
info.description: Azure IoT Central is a service that makes it easy to connect, monitor, and manage your IoT devices at scale.

tenantId.description: The AAD tenant ID of the AD Group.

objectId.description: The AAD object ID of the AD Group.

id.description: Unique ID of the API token.

expiry.description: String-formatted date representing the time when the token expires.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of API tokens.

type.description: The kind of authentication to use.

connectionString.description: The connection string for accessing the blob storage account.

containerName.description: Name of the container where data should be written in the storage account.

endpointUri.description: The storage account's blob service endpoint URL.

containerName.description: Name of the container where data should be written in the storage account.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of entities.

clusterUrl.description: The resource URI of the Data Explorer instance.

database.description: Name Data Explorer database where data should be written.

table.description: The table within the Data Explorer database that will receive the data.

type.description: The kind of authentication to use.

code.description: The code for the error that occurred.

message.description: The description of the error that occurred.

status.description: Indication of the current health and operation of the export or destination.

errors.description: Errors encountered by the export or destination.

lastExportTime.description: The timestamp of the last message that was sent to the export or destination.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of destinations.

id.description: The ID of the destination where data should be sent.

transform.description: Query for transforming the message structure to a particular output.

etag.description: ETag used to prevent conflict in device updates.

template.description: The device template definition for the device.

enabled.description: Whether the device connection to IoT Central has been enabled.

provisioned.description: Whether resources have been allocated for the device.

organizations.description: List of organization IDs that the device is a part of.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of devices.

id.description: The request ID of the device command execution.

connectionTimeout.description: Connection timeout in seconds to wait for a disconnected device to come online. Defaults to 0 seconds.

responseTimeout.description: Response timeout in seconds to wait for a command completion on a device. Defaults to 30 seconds.

request.description: The payload for the device command.

response.description: The payload of the device command response.

responseCode.description: The status code of the device command response.

value.description: The collection of device command executions.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of device command executions.

idScope.description: ID scope for connecting to the IoT Central application.

symmetricKey.description: The symmetric key credentials for the device.

x509.description: The X.509 credential information for the device.

tpm.description: The TPM credentials for the device.

id.description: Unique ID of the device group.

displayName.description: Display name of the device group.

organizations.description: List of organization IDs of the device group.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of device groups.

DeviceProperties.description: Property values associated with the device.

DeviceRelationship.description: An object representing the relationship between an upstream and a downstream device.

id.description: The unique identifier of this relationship.

name.description: The name which describes this relationship between given devices from source device template.

source.description: The device ID of the source (parent) device.

target.description: The device ID of the target (child) device.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of device relationships.

value.description: The last known value of this device telemetry.

timestamp.description: String-formatted date representing the time when the telemetry value was sent.

@id.description: Unique ID of the device template.

@type.description: The JSON-LD types of this device template.

etag.description: ETag used to prevent conflict in device template updates.

displayName.description: Display name of the device template.

description.description: Detailed description of the device template.

capabilityModel.description: The capability model utilized by this device template.

deploymentManifest.description: Deployment manifest associated to this device template.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of device templates.

target.description: The device template or interface which defines the target capability for the enrichment.

path.description: The path to the target capability within the device template or the system property to use.

value.description: The raw value used for the enrichment.

type.description: The kind of authentication to use.

connectionString.description: The connection string for accessing the Event Hubs namespace, including the `EntityPath` of the event hub.

hostName.description: The host name of the Event Hubs namespace.

enabled.description: Toggle to start/stop an export from sending data.

source.description: The type of data to export.

values.name: DeviceTemplateLifecycle
values.description: Destination source from device template lifecycle

filter.description: Query defining which events from the source should be exported.

enrichments.description: Additional pieces of information to include with each sent message. Data is represented as a set of key/value pairs, where the key is the name of the enrichment that will appear in the output message and the value identifies the data to send.

destinations.description: The list of destinations to which the export should send data.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of exports.

account.description: The storage account name where to upload the file to

connectionString.description: The connection string used to configure the storage account

container.description: The name of the container inside the storage account

sasTtl.description: ISO 8601 duration standard, The amount of time the deviceâ€™s request to upload a file is valid before it expires.

state.description: The state of the file upload configuration

etag.description: ETag used to prevent conflict with multiple uploads

group.description: The ID of the device group on which to execute the job.

batch.description: The batching configuration for the job.

cancellationThreshold.description: The cancellation threshold for the job.

data.description: The capabilities being updated by the job and the values with which they are being updated.

status.description: Indicates whether the job is starting, running, etc.

organizations.description: List of organizations of the job.

type.description: Whether batching is done on a specified number of devices or a percentage of the total devices.

values.name: Number
values.description: Job Batching based on number of devices.

values.name: Percentage
values.description: Job Batching based percentage of total applied devices.

value.description: The number or percentage of devices on which batching is done.

type.description: Whether the cancellation threshold is per a specified number of devices or a percentage of the total devices.

values.name: Number
values.description: Job cancellation threshold based on specified number of devices.

values.name: Percentage
values.description: Job cancellation threshold based on percentage of total devices.

value.description: The number or percentage of devices on which the cancellation threshold is applied.

batch.description: Whether the cancellation threshold applies per-batch or to the overall job.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of jobs.

target.description: The device template which defines the target capability for the job.

path.description: The path to the target capability within the device template.

value.description: The value used to update the target capability, if any.

id.description: ID of the device whose job status is being provided.

status.description: Indicates whether the job is starting, running, etc. for the given device.

value.description: The collection of job device statuses.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of job device statuses.

parent.description: ID of the parent of the organization.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of organizations.

roles.description: List of role assignments that specify the permissions to access the application.

role.description: ID of the role for this role assignment.

organization.description: ID of the organization for this role assignment.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of roles.

type.description: The kind of authentication to use.

connectionString.description: The connection string for accessing the Service Bus namespace, including the `EntityPath` of the queue.

hostName.description: The host name of the Service Bus namespace.

type.description: The kind of authentication to use.

connectionString.description: The connection string for accessing the Service Bus namespace, including the `EntityPath` of the topic.

hostName.description: The host name of the Service Bus namespace.

tenantId.description: The AAD tenant ID of the service principal.

objectId.description: The AAD object ID of the service principal.

primaryKey.description: The primary key for this credential.

secondaryKey.description: The secondary key for this credential.

symmetricKey.description: The symmetric key credentials for this attestation.

endorsementKey.description: The TPM endorsement key for this credential.

tpm.description: The TPM credentials for this attestation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of users.

url.description: The URL to invoke when exporting data.

queryCustomizations.description: Additional query parameters that should be added to each request.

headerCustomizations.description: Additional headers that should be added to each request.

type.description: The kind of authentication to use.

value.description: The value to use for this webhook customization.

secret.description: Whether to consider the value to be a secret and hide it when retrieving the destination configuration.

value.description: Value to use for the Authorization header when making requests.

tokenUrl.description: URL where an access token can be retrieved.

clientId.description: OAuth2 client ID used when retrieving the token.

clientSecret.description: OAuth2 client secret used to retrieve the token.

values.name: Auto
values.description: Use automatic Content-Type for token request

values.name: Json
values.description: Content-Type as JSON for token request

values.name: UrlEncoded
values.description: Content-Type as UrlEncoded for token request

clientCertificates.description: The X.509 client certificates for this credential.

x509.description: The X.509 credentials for this attestation.

certificate.description: The string representation of this certificate.

sha1Thumbprint.description: The SHA-1 hash value of the certificate.

primary.description: The primary X.509 certificate for this credential.

secondary.description: The secondary X.509 certificate for this credential.

get.summary: Get the list of API tokens in an application. The token value will never be returned for security reasons.
Get an API token by ID.

parameters.name: tokenId
parameters.description: Unique ID for the API token.

put.summary: Create a new API token in the application to use in the IoT Central public API. The token value will be returned in the response, and won't be returned again in subsequent requests.

parameters.name: tokenId
parameters.description: Unique ID for the API token.

parameters.name: tokenId
parameters.description: Unique ID for the API token.

get.summary: Get the list of destinations in an application.
Get a destination by ID.

put.description: Create or update a definition for where to send data.

patch.description: Perform an incremental update to a destination.

get.summary: List all exports connected to the given destination.
Get the list of exports in an application.
Get an export by ID.

put.description: Create or update a definition for exporting data. Also used to connect or disconnect an export from destinations.

patch.description: Perform an incremental update to an export.

get.summary: List all destinations connected to the given export.
Get the list of device groups in an application.
Get the list of device templates in an application with basic ODATA support ($top, $filter, $orderby), [more details](https://aka.ms/iotcentralodatasupport).
Get a device template by ID

put.summary: Publish a new device template. Default views will be automatically generated for new device templates created this way.

patch.summary: Update the cloud properties and overrides of an existing device template via patch.

delete.description: Delete an existing device template by device ID.

get.summary: Get the list of devices in an application with basic ODATA support ($top, $filter, $orderby), [more details](https://aka.ms/iotcentralodatasupport).
Get a device by ID
get.description: Get details about an existing device by device ID.

patch.description: Update an existing device by ID.

delete.description: Delete an existing device by device ID.

get.summary: Get device attestation

patch.summary: Update an individual device attestation via patch

get.summary: Get device command history

post.description: Run a command on a device.

get.summary: List the components present in a device
Get component command history

post.description: Run a command on a component.

get.summary: Get device properties for a specific component

put.summary: Replace device properties for a specific component

patch.summary: Update device properties for a specific component via patch

get.summary: Get component telemetry value
get.description: Get the last telemetry value from a component.

get.summary: Get device credentials
List the modules present in a device
Get module command history

post.description: Run a command on a module.

get.summary: List the components present in a module
Get module component command history

post.description: Run a command on a module.

get.summary: Get module properties for a specific component

put.summary: Replace module properties for a specific component

patch.summary: Update module properties for a specific component via patch

get.summary: Get module component telemetry value
get.description: Get the last telemetry value from a module component.

get.summary: Get module properties
get.description: Get all property values of a module.

put.description: Replace all property values of a module.

patch.description: Update property values of a module.

get.summary: Get module telemetry value
get.description: Get the last telemetry value from a module.

get.summary: Get device properties
get.description: Get all property values of a device by device ID.

put.description: Replace all property values of a device by device ID.

patch.description: Update property values of a device by device ID.

get.summary: Given the ID for an upstream device, will return the upstream and the downstream relationships associated with that gateway. These downstream relationships are only those associated with the direct downstream level (they donâ€™t work recursively).
get.description: List all relationships based on device ID

get.summary: Given the ID for a device and a relationship ID associated with this device, get the details of the relationship.

put.summary: Given the ID for a device and a relationship ID associated with this device, create a new relationship for between the given device and a second device specified in the body.

patch.summary: Patch a given relationship given the relationship ID and a given device ID.

delete.summary: Given the ID for a device and an associated relationship ID, delete the relationship. The given device ID can be that of the upstream or downstream device.

get.summary: Get device telemetry value
get.description: Get the last telemetry value from a device.

get.summary: Get the file upload storage account configuration.

put.summary: Create the file upload storage account configuration.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: File upload storage account configuration body.

patch.summary: Update the file upload storage account configuration

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: File upload storage account configuration body.

delete.summary: Delete the file upload storage configuration.

get.summary: Get the list of jobs in an application
Get a job by ID
get.description: Get details about a running or completed job by job ID.

put.description: Create and execute a new job via its job definition.

get.summary: Get device statuses
get.description: Get the list of individual device statuses by job ID.

put.summary: Rerun a job on failed devices
put.description: Execute a rerun of an existing job on all failed devices.

parameters.name: rerunId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the job rerun.

post.description: Resume execution of an existing stopped job.
Stop execution of a job that is currently running.

get.summary: Get the list of organizations the user has access to in an application
Get an organization by ID

put.summary: Create an organization in the application

patch.summary: Update an organization in the application via patch

post.summary: Run a query and obtain the result

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: query, more details in [IoT central query language](https://aka.ms/iotcql)

get.summary: Get the list of roles in an application.
Get a role by ID.
Get the list of users in an application
Get a user by ID

put.summary: Create a user in the application

patch.summary: Update a user in the application via patch

BaseDomain.name: baseDomain
BaseDomain.description: The base domain for all Azure IoT Central service requests.

DeviceTemplateId.name: deviceTemplateId
DeviceTemplateId.description: Unique [Digital Twin Model Identifier](https://github.com/Azure/opendigitaltwins-dtdl/blob/master/DTDL/v2/dtdlv2.md#digital-twin-model-identifier) of the device template.

RelationshipId.name: relationshipId
RelationshipId.description: Unique ID of a relationship between devices.

Version.name: api-version
Version.description: The version of the API being called.

orderBy.name: $orderby
orderBy.description: The order by string for results.
